backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister implementing access-controlled user profiles and order submission with storage and admin role checks.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining legacy data structures and a passthrough upgrade function for actor state.
backend/old.mo: Legacy data model containing older order and signature types used prior to IDInformation refactor.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to frontend files, components, and associated test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Auto-generated summary list describing the purpose of various frontend files for documentation or build planning.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Comprehensive deployment guide explaining how to deploy the backend canister and host the frontend on cPanel.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining theme variables and light/dark mode color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry page mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/public/.htaccess: Optional Apache config providing compression, caching, security headers, and MIME types for static hosting.
frontend/public/DEPLOYMENT.md: Guide for self-hosting the frontend on cPanel while relying on the backend deployed on the Internet Computer.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling hash-based routing, authentication state, and layout with navigation.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAcces: Wrapper enforcing admin-only access with loading, error, and login states.
frontend/src/components/admin/PaymentCon: Form for admins to update payment contact status and notes with validation and submit handling.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button managing Internet Identity authentication and error recovery.
frontend/src/components/LoginRequiredScr: UI screen prompting unauthenticated users to log in before accessing protected actions.
frontend/src/components/SignaturePad.tsx: Canvas-based signature input component with drawing, clearing, and data export.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Hook checking admin permissions using the actor and II state with proper loading and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, identity loading, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: Defines React Query hooks for submitting orders and fetching or updating order data through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfile.ts: Implements hooks to fetch and update the caller’s user profile, with identity-based query invalidation and refetching.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures global Tailwind styles, CSS variables for themes, and base layout/typography rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrderDetai: Admin view for loading order details, reviewing uploaded assets, and updating payment contact status with feedback.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Admin orders page that fetches all orders, applies search and filter logic, computes stats, and displays results in a table UI with admin-access gating.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the marketing homepage with a hero section, feature cards, and navigation actions for ordering and pricing.
frontend/src/pages/MyOrdersPage.tsx: Displays the logged‑in user’s orders, handles authentication gating, and shows detailed order views when selected.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Displays an order confirmation screen and auto-opens a modal with payment contact details and accepted methods.
frontend/src/pages/OrderPage.tsx: Provides a full order form with validation, ID info entry, photo/signature upload, and submission handling for authenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/PricesPage.tsx: Shows pricing details, feature highlights, and quantity examples with navigation to the order page.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Allows authenticated users to view and edit their profile details, save changes, and access admin tools if authorized.
frontend/src/utils/assetPaths.ts: Utility helpers that prepend the app’s base URL to asset and document paths for safe static hosting.
frontend/src/utils/fileValidation.ts: Client-side image file validator enforcing type and size limits plus helpers to convert files to byte arrays.
frontend/src/utils/idGenerators.ts: Randomized name and address generators using predefined lists for mock data.
frontend/src/utils/orderFormatting.ts: Formatting helpers for order timestamps and enum-based order and payment statuses.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities to read, persist, and clear URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/usStates.ts: Static list of US states with labels and abbreviations for form dropdowns.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing admin-access fixes, requirements, issues, and new feature requests tied to Internet Identity admin verification.
